H0.text: What might a Geordie call a ‘tab’. Fag

H1.text: What might a Geordie call a ‘tab’. Smoke

H2.text: What might a Geordie call a ‘tab’. Drag

H3.text: What might a Geordie call a ‘tab’. Cig

A4.text: In Britain, it is also called a dog-end or a fag end.

A5.text: The common name for the remains of a cigarette after smoking is a cigarette butt.
